title: RT News - October 27, 2019 (12:00 MSK)
text: Russian national and gun rights activist Maria Butina arrives here in Moscow, after serving most of an 18-month prison sentence in the US for unregistered lobbying activities. She spoke to RT. American troops are staying in Syria after a U-turn by the US to secure lucrative oil fields in the north-east of the country. Washington's also sending more soldiers to Iraq and Saudi Arabia despite President Trump's claims that they were all coming home. A week of violent protests demanding social reform grip Chile - until recently it was seen as an "oasis" compared to other Latin American countries.
description: Russian national and gun rights activist Maria Butina arrives here in Moscow, after serving most of an 18-month prison sentence in the US for unregistered lobbying activities
